product_name: DysonAirwrap i.d. Multi-styler and Dryer Straight+Wavy Hair
summary: SummaryThe Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ now with a Bluetooth enabled curling feature through the MyDyson app for one touch, personalized styling. A faster, easier way to achieve more consistent curls with no heat damage.^ Includes barrels to curl, dryers to prepare and finish and brushes to shape, smooth and volumize.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe only connected multi-styler to recommend a personalized curling routine according to your hair and styling profileDries and styles simultaneously using the Coanda effect, no heat damageSix versatile attachments engineered to dry, curl, shape, smooth, and hide flyaways for straight and wavy hairi.d. curlâ„¢ helps to create perfect curls, every timeFeaturesBluetoothÂ® wireless technology enabled to create a personalized curling routine according to your hair profile in the MyDysonâ„¢ appCoanda styling pioneered by Dyson: The Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ multi-styler harnesses an aerodynamic phenomenon called the Coanda effect. It uses air to attract and wrap hair to the barrel or surface of the brushPowered by the Dyson digital motor V9: The 13-blade impeller spins at up to 110,000rpm, generating 3.2kPa. Powerful enough to produce the air pressure that creates the Coanda effectIntelligent heat control: Measures airflow temperature over 40 times a second, intelligently controlling the heating element to prevent heat damageNegative ions: Charged particles in the airflow help reduce static in the hairi.d. curl (compatible with barrel attachments) - once set up in the app, simply slide the machine on to activate your personalized curling routineAirflow speed - Three precise airflow speeds to suit your styling preferenceTemperature control - Three precise heat settingsCold shot - Immediately deactivates the heating element for cooler air to set your style^vs. original Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ multi-styler and dryerIncludesAirwrap i.d.â„¢ Multi-styler and Dryer Straight+WavyConical barrel to style close to the root, for defined curls in all hair types2-in-1 Dryer+Flyaway smoother to dry damp hair and smooth finished styles with the Coanda effectLarge round volumizing brush to add body and shape longer hair as it driesSoft smoothing brush to gently align and smooth fine hair with increased control for straighter styles1.6" Airwrapâ„¢ long barrel to create voluminous curls and waves in both directionsFast dryer to take hair from wet to damp so it's ready for stylingsFilter cleaning brush to quickly clean your Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ filterPresentation case to protect and neatly store your Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ multi-styler and attachments with a removable lid that is also a non-slip mat for your Airwrapâ„¢Item 2638794How To UseHOW TO CONNECTâ€¢ Download the MyDysonâ„¢ app and create your account.â€¢ Plug in and power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ multi-styler and dryer and add machine to the app. BluetoothÂ® wireless technology must be enabled on your mobile device.â€¢ Follow the steps in the MyDysonâ„¢ app to pair your Airwrap i.d.â„¢. Airflow will be active as you pair.â€¢ Once paired, power off your Airwrap i.d.â„¢. Continue set-up in the app to enable features such as the i.d. curlâ„¢ personalized curling sequence.â€¢ Take the simple quiz on the app to set up your personalized hair profile. Your Airwrap i.d.â„¢ will automatically tailor its settings to match your styling preferences.â€¢ Now, you're ready to wrap, style, and set your curls with the touch of a button. Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.STYLING TIPSâ€¢ For best results, start with freshly washed hair. Use the Fast dryer to take hair from damp to about 80% dry.â€¢ Use the Conical barrel for a defined curl.â€¢ Use the Smoothing brush to smooth hair if needed before curling.â€¢ Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: HOW TO CONNECTâ€¢ Download the MyDysonâ„¢ app and create your account.â€¢ Plug in and power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ multi-styler and dryer and add machine to the app. BluetoothÂ® wireless technology must be enabled on your mobile device.â€¢ Follow the steps in the MyDysonâ„¢ app to pair your Airwrap i.d.â„¢. Airflow will be active as you pair.â€¢ Once paired, power off your Airwrap i.d.â„¢. Continue set-up in the app to enable features such as the i.d. curlâ„¢ personalized curling sequence.â€¢ Take the simple quiz on the app to set up your personalized hair profile. Your Airwrap i.d.â„¢ will automatically tailor its settings to match your styling preferences.â€¢ Now, you're ready to wrap, style, and set your curls with the touch of a button. Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.STYLING TIPSâ€¢ For best results, start with freshly washed hair. Use the Fast dryer to take hair from damp to about 80% dry.â€¢ Use the Conical barrel for a defined curl.â€¢ Use the Smoothing brush to smooth hair if needed before curling.â€¢ Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.

reviews.headline: Totally worth the money!
reviews.comments: The only thing I regret is not buying it sooner. I had it on my wish list for 2 years before I decided to splurge on it. Best hair tool I've ever used.

reviews.headline: It's Okay.
reviews.comments: I am liking it i never wanted to curl my hair with a sleek looking flat iron and did not use products with my hair not even hairspray and i like no hairspray in my hair as well like the mousse'.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY FROM ULTA!!!
reviews.comments: Have owned this product for less than 2 years....needs repair and is still under warranty. Cannot find receipt and have requested proof of purchase from Ulta Guest Services. Over 3 weeks of my request being escalated and I still do not have receipt. Would never purchase such an expensive item from Ulta again! Guest Services/Customer Service is truly non-existent!

reviews.headline: Worth every penny ðŸ¥²
reviews.comments:
I have thin, fine asian hair.  You need this in your life lol! Even though the price tag is steep I think its worth it. I use it everyday. My favorite attatchments are the fast hair dryer and the big barrel. The id curl is such an awesome function! Makes my hair dry SO fast (i was using a conair hair dryer before) and the air wrap curls are so voluminous!! I also feel like my hair is less damaged now than using my curling iron. Steep price but worth it. Wait til it goes on sale and save your ulta points to get the best deal! :) 

The only two cons about the dyson air wrap id is the bulky cord and the price tag.

reviews.headline: Birthday gift ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‚
reviews.comments:
I got this airwarp ID for my birthday from my man and its the best ever hair tool ever! At first 
its confusing but after i tried it on my mom and daughter it was soooo good! Its now made my styling so much easier!!! Adore this and also the bluetooth makes it so much easier!

reviews.headline: For actual curls, don't buy
reviews.comments: I gave the product 3 stars for the technology. The hair grips onto the barrels and i love that you dont need to switch out curling barrels. But i tried everything to get this thing to hold a curl - mousse, pinning, if there is no actual curling iron type plating on the barrels it is very unlikely it will hold. The straightening tools work good.

reviews.headline: Does not last
reviews.comments: I loved the blow out, no more hair frizz or sleeping with wet hair, did quick styles used it a few times and it gave out on me not too long after I sent it in for repair for a month now and I still havent heard back i honestly regret this purchaseâ€¦

reviews.headline: yes, yes, yes.
reviews.comments: i finally brought myself to buying the airwrap, it comes with a hefty price tag but its absolutely worth it. its more easier to use than the original version but its always been a styler thats easy to use, the app definitely helps when it comes to using the i.d. curl feature in able to get the best curls with the best hold, i love it so much!

reviews.headline: Too pricey for what's supposed to be
reviews.comments:
I have tried many methods but curls do not stay
And its why i bought this product for
Seems all of the attachments work for one objective only and thats to dry your hair 
Blow out style but not to curl your hair
The only attachment i like is the round brush 
But i feel there are many products out there that can dry my hair in that way without having to doend so much

reviews.headline: Pry this from my cold dead hands
reviews.comments: I recently bought the airwrap i.d. to replace my original airwrap origins for long hair. It's basically the same tool with smart technology and a couple of different attachments. I absolutely love this tool. I can't believe I went so many years without it. When I first got my original there was a huge learning curve and I was not having much success with achieving the look I wanted. Because I spent so much money on it I was determined to figure it out so I watched at least a dozen YouTube videos with tutorials on how to get the most out of the airwrap and after enough practice I finally got the hang of it. The i.d. version works exactly the same way but you can connect it to your smart phone via bluetooth and the app controls each step: wrapping, curling, cool shot. You no longer have to think about it. I get that counting how long to curl your hair is not that difficult, but this version costs the same as the non-connected version (at least for now) so for the same amount of money why not get the more advanced version? You don't have to use the smart phone app if you don't want to. You can also customize the timings on each step to your own preferences. The conical wand is amazing. I was skeptical about it at first and preferred to use the larger straight barrel but after giving the conical barrel a shot I am hooked. I believe you can buy this attachment from Dyson so if you have an older machine but want to try the new barrel you can just buy one from them. All their attachments are interchangeable with all their machines. If you invest in this device I strongly recommend that you watch as many YouTube tutorials that you can and try each of their tips and recommendations. My hair is long and fine and holding a curl is a challenge. With the right styling products and the Dyson air wrap, I have far more good hair days than bad ones.

reviews.headline: Missing filter brush
reviews.comments: I just received it and its missing the filter brush. I saw another review saying the same, although I'm not sure if that was at Ulta or Dyson website. I'll try to call Dyson tomorrow. For the price, I expect it to come with all the listed attachments. I've checked the box and case, no filter brush.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This dries my hair so fast and it is so easy to use.

reviews.headline: WORTH IT
reviews.comments: I didn't think there was any way at all this would be worth it... its so good I LOVE IT

reviews.headline: Love!!!!! So good left my hair smooth and glossy
reviews.comments: I would totally recommend this product. It is so worth every single penny it is so good and I like that. It comes with a whole bunch of attachments so you can have the variety and I personally don't have the most quietly of hair so I normally go in with the curl and just get my hair, nice and quailed and pretty And sometimes I end up with waves in my hair when I don't want waves and my favorite thing about it is how easy it is to use

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money.
reviews.comments: This is actually my second airwrap. The motor went out in the firat one in 10 months. Got a replacement under warranty and that one went out 3 days after the warranty went out. They wanted $300 for a new motor. Service is the worst.

reviews.headline: Best hair tool I've ever owned!
reviews.comments: This Dyson Airwrap has completely changed my hair game. It dries, styles, and protects my hair without damage. The results are salon-quality at home! It's a total game-changer for wavy hair like mine. Worth every penny!

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: Well worth the money,  I love the app and how it walked me through the curling process.  The instructions were easy to follow.  My hair is very thin but I have so much of it.  It generally takes me an hour to blow dry and style my hair with a blow dryer and curling iron.   My hair  was damp when I started and looks like I just left the salon.  It literally took me about 15 minutes to curl my hair. There is so much volume.  I cant wait to try out other attachments.

reviews.headline: Missing filter attachment
reviews.comments: I love my dyson but it is missing an attachment and ulta and dyson both refuse to do anything about it.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this hair wrap! I have the dyson blowdryer for 7 years and still going but i wanted to get more attachments for beachy and soft curl look. Its pricey but worth it, they last long if you care for it properly.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this hair wrap! I have the dyson blowdryer for 7 years and still going but i wanted to get more attachments for beachy and soft curl look. Its pricey but worth it, they last long if you care for it properly.

rollup.name: Airwrap i.d. Multi-styler and Dryer Straight+Wavy Hair
